options.name: Predator Pennant
options.description: The bearer's unit gains Devastating Charge (Distracting).

options.name: Baited Banner
options.description: Model parts with Harnessed in the bearer's unit gain Hatred.

options.name: Wicked Serrations
options.description: While using this weapon, the wielder gains Lightning Reflexes and +1 Attack Value. In addition, single model units that have suffered one or more hits from this weapon suffer -1 Resilience and -1 Attack Value until the end of the Combat Phase.

options.name: Rocket Arrows
options.description: Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 2 [10], Area Attack (1×5), [Multiple Wounds (2)], Reload!

options.name: Breath of the Brass Bull
options.description: The bearer's model gains +1 Health Point and the bearer gains Breath Attack (Toxic Attacks).

options.name: Zartosht's Chains
options.description: Enemy units in base contact with the bearer's model suffer -2 Defensive Skill. The roll for Flee Distance of enemy units in base contact with the bearer's model is subject to Minimised Roll.
